
Intercepted messages from a secret society were encrypted with RSA, but their modulus is a product of two Blum integers. Decrypt the secret plan: 6659795775234146639817649975892546013651207634038276630911603027465901425008616305381347711951605170537110596979640107626926424886380841929543589307492351


The flag format is flag{...}
n=8778736338812434843773596638225459548270971249427291112887220525983359705732640590616325418668213970470042661468239838574872152201428898451607994346136877, e=24057042385582524381200943444565278400880916524881502144778114543737441281034483254552112888101215027067673266434142853429796441198143325868000176531371
The lower 104 bits of p are: 72396128280166925897384508711182620447


---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{7daetmxk}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 6659795775234146639817649975892546013651207634038276630911603027465901425008616305381347711951605170537110596979640107626926424886380841929543589307492351
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=8778736338812434843773596638225459548270971249427291112887220525983359705732640590616325418668213970470042661468239838574872152201428898451607994346136877, e=24057042385582524381200943444565278400880916524881502144778114543737441281034483254552112888101215027067673266434142853429796441198143325868000176531371
The lower 104 bits of p are: 72396128280166925897384508711182620447

extra_info: p=78082470206110019366207246475176347049003326072051613198989484692587790554911, q=112429029404931547577827281731782539408915556722814442430111904410396870227507, Ï†(n)=8778736338812434843773596638225459548270971249427291112887220525983359705732450079116714377101269935941835702581781919692077286145799797062505009685354460
